EmailTemplate.description: Used to inform the customers that a case has been closed
EmailTemplate.name: EUR - Case Closed - HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} - closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
You have submitted a case with the following description: "{!Case.Description}"
The case is now closed.
Should you need to log a new Case with us, please use our Customer Portal.
Best regards,
